quote: Shift out of supermodel mode and into teacher mode. Focus on your message, not your appearance.
why_clipworthy: This advice helps agents overcome a common barrier to using video effectively.
suggested_hook: Struggling to feel confident on camera? Here's a mindset shift that can help.

quote: Video is a modern networking tool. Treat every contact like a real person.
why_clipworthy: This emphasizes the importance of personal connection in digital marketing.
suggested_hook: Want to turn your social media followers into clients? Here's how.
